summary: This document is an email forwarding a link to a Rolling Stone article about the Netflix documentary 'Filthy Rich' covering Jeffrey Epstein. The email was sent from an iPhone on May 29, 2020, and references shocking revelations from the documentary.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure of the Netflix documentary 'Filthy Rich' which is the subject of the forwarded Rolling Stone article.

events.title: Email forwarding Rolling Stone article
events.description: An email was sent containing a link to a Rolling Stone article about the Netflix documentary 'Filthy Rich' covering Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a link to a Rolling Stone article about the Netflix documentary 'Filthy Rich'.
The email was sent on May 29, 2020, from an iPhone.
The Rolling Stone article discusses 'shocking revelations' from the documentary about Jeffrey Epstein.
